bike.description: Lightweight 6061 aluminum comfort frame design with full-length chainguard, fenders and kickstand

components.description: Comfort unicrown, oversized, with radiused blades
Alloy 36H rims with small flange nutted hubs and 14G nickel-plated spokes
Brooklyn Speedway, 20 x 2.125", black with whitewalls
Shimano TX31 short cage rear derailleur with protective guard
Comfort style pedals with non-slip TPE insert
Comfort riser type, 6JAMIS_DEGREE sweep X 30mm rise x 560mm wide
Hi-rise comfort type, 60JAMIS_DEGREE rise x 90mm extension with 150mm quill
Embossed & stitched vinyl cover over comfort foam
Jamis Youth Comfort with embossed vinyl and single loop springs
Alloy linear pull type with full alloy short reach levers
